column1: pitched up - too full - attached with width outside off, Kamran leans into it and square-drives it. The ball skips away to the boundary
back-to-back boundaries! Good length and slanting away outside off, Kamran employs finesse. Opens the bat-face and glides it past lone slip
full inswinger from Amir, Kamran, who is hanging back, squirts an inside edge onto the pad. The ball rolls away square on the leg side
back of a length, this simply goes away outside off with the angle. Slashed down to deep third man for one
length and outside off, 144.2ks, jabbed towards backward point
skiddy back-of-a-length delivery around off, Malan is pinned on the backfoot as he dabs a single down to third man
pushed through and slides away outside off, past the outside edge
fired outside off at nearly 94ks, Malan presses forward and creams a drive in the gap at the covers. The ball is coming onto the bat nicely
tossed up, played back to the bowler
back of a length and rolls on outside off, Malan stands tall and punches to mid-off
Wasim errs short and outside off, Malan belts it away between the covers and point for the second boundary of the over
quick fizzer on middle and leg - no room - blocked back to Wasim
Kamran weathers an lbw appeal. Back of a length, skids on quickly and raps the back thigh, well above the knee-roll. Kamran plays across the line and misses
full awayswinger outside off, Kamran spars at it and watches it scoot past the outside edge. That should keep the slip fielder interested
length and outside off, pushed to point
wide of the crease, this length ball, though, largely holds its line outside off. Kamran has a leaden-footed flash and does not connect
wide of the crease, full and angled in, jammed out towards midwicket via an inside edge
here comes Malan. Down the track, frees his arms and nails this very full ball - Malan manufactured the length - up and over the covers. Hit flat and hard. Nearly went all the way

hip-high short ball outside off, Kamran attempts a pull. Has to settle with an inside edge that trickles behind. Sanga dives full-length to his left to stop that. The 39-year old proves that he still has it, again
good length and angling away outside off, beats the outside edge
good length ball on off, Kamran aims a loft. He only flaps it tamely over mid-on
very full on the stumps, bunted to mid-on
pretty full, tucks 'em up for room. Worked to midwicket
length ball on off stump, Kamran clears his front leg, has a swing at it but can't beat mid-on to his left
picked off the hips square through the leg side
wide of the crease, angled in short on middle, Kamran short-arms it away to deep square leg. Mis-hit

dragged short and outside off, not short enough to trouble Malan. He gets on top of the ball and thumps a pull over midwicket. The man in the deep was too square. He simply watched the ball scoot to the boundary
follows the short one with a full ball on the leg stump. Defended
cheeky little slower one on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
attempts another slower one, the line is wrong, drifting down leg. Left alone. Leg-side wide
banged in short and just outside off, not too much room for Malan. He wildly throws his bat at the ball and only connects with thin air
just clears the outstretched hand of mid-off. Pretty full on off, right in the slot, Kamran clears his front leg and has a go at it. Gets away
follows it with a slower ball on middle and off, Kamran waits for the ball to arrive and then dinks it into the vacant spaces at cover
full and veering into the pads, Malan picks it up and dumps the ball over midwicket. A whirl of the wrists to put that away for a six
full and outside off, stays in the crease and angles a single down to deep third man

pitched up and outside off, stroked to the covers. Malan strays out of his crease at the non-striker's end. He aims for a risky single. Kamran isn't interested. A little mix-up but no harm done for Peshwar
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, with fine leg inside the circle that might have disappeared. Usman escapes punishment. Glanced straight to short fine leg
Karan shows his ace early. Skips out, Imad pushes it wide outside off. Hint of turn. Sliced in the air, does not carry to sweeper cover
slides on middle, no turn, Malan attempts a scoop, flicks the pad and runs away fine on the off side
pushed through on middle, played back to the bowler
Kamran backs away outside leg, takes this full one from outside off. Flayed away to deep cover
skids on outside off, driven with a slicing finish. Babar at extra cover throws himself to his left and stops the ball
darted on the leg stump, pushed past Imad's left
low full-toss on middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
fractionally short and outside off, chopped to cover
non-turning ball on the leg stump, shovelled away to deep square leg
shortish and outside off, slashes a cut to point
fetch that! Kamran gallops down the track, does not get close to the pitch. But the forearms generate all the power. Launched straight over the bowler's head
full-toss outside off, Kamran, having stepped away outside leg, tonks it over the covers for back-to-back sixes
Malan uses his feet, down the track and forces a short ball to long-off
flat and outside off, Kamran steps away outside leg and biffs it to sweeper cover
fuller and faster on the leg stump, Malan ventures outside leg stump and hits it down to long-off
Imad errs in length. Dishes out a middle-stump full-toss. Kamran crouches and feasts on it. The ball disappears over long-on
hurled on middle, backs away and chops to cover
shortish and sliding across the left-hander. Forced down the ground to long-off
floated full and outside off, driven hard to long-on
short on off, keeps low, pulled off the knee towards deep midwicket. He did well to connect with the ball
slower length ball on off, stroked to long-off
slightly short on middle, another slower ball. Kamran picked the length up really early. Skipping back and crunching a pull to the right of deep midwicket
short on middle and leg, miscues a pull towards short fine leg
98ks short ball on the off stump, Kamran unleashes another pull. Deep midwicket stumbles and gifts a boundary. 33-ball fifty for Kamran. The drink should taste sweeter for him. Time-out
good length and holds its line outside off. Malan misjudges the length. Cuts and misses
short and outside off, Malan sits back and drags a pull to midwicket
142.1ks searing yorker on the leg stump, Kamran, having moved away outside leg, jams it out to cover
very full on middle, opens the face and drives towards deep point

slower short ball on the leg stump, Kamran flits around in the crease. Plays early as the ball dribbles to point via an inside edge. The fielder hits the stumps. Kamran and Malan pinch another via a ricochet. The TV umpire checks for a run-out chance, but Malan is in
picked up and flicked to long leg
cunning slower ball wide outside off, Kamran lets it pass
sweeper cover tears across to his left and stops the ball. Slower short ball outside off, carved away

No century opening stand. Sohail breaks the stand. Azam takes the catch at long-on. Another slower short ball outside off, Malan aims to go downtown with a loft. But the bottom hand flies off the bat, which means he miscues it to Azam
seam-up, short angled in on off, tucks him up for room. Tapped down the ground
chest-high short ball on middle, swivels on the back foot and pulls to long leg
tossed up nicely, driven on the front foot to long-off
shorter legbreak, pulled on the back foot to long-on
Launched into the second tier. Kamran charges down the track, meets a half-volley and lofts it over long-off. Top shot
faster and flatter just outside off, slashes and misses
goes low and slog-sweeps a googly to deep midwicket
Samuels presses on for two and gets it. Legbreak. Short and turns away outside off, Samuels goes back and cuts it to the left of sweeper cover
full and outside off, Kamran swings and ends up slicing the ball in the air. Drops into no-man's land at sweeper cover
short slower ball on off, Kamran pulls early and ends up copping a blow on his body
slower short ball on off, drags a pull to deep midwicket
103ks short ball outside off, backs away and slaps it to sweeper cover
slower ball, pings the blockhole on off, squirted away for one
pitched up on off, right in the hitting radar. Kamran does not need any second invitations. Clears his front leg and hoists it over Bopara's head for another six
possibly a slower ball, comes in, tapped to the off side
very full on off, Kamran clears his front leg and drills it fiercely past the bowler
and Samuels tips the strike over to Kamran again. Back of a length and outside off, dabs a cut to deep third man
wide of the crease, angled in, slower bouncer, beats the hook lavishly. Kamran played early and was duped
Usman nails a yorker on off, squirted back to the bowler
Kamran pre-meditates by moving across off, flicks a single to long leg. Impressive over - only four runs off it
short on the leg stump, slower one, swiped away to deep square leg
dug in short and outside off, Samuels brings out the pull, Imad runs to his right, puts in a lazy effort and lets the ball through him to the boundary. Coach Arthur is peeved
slower length ball on off, Samuels hacks at it and inside-edges it onto the pad
slower full ball outside off, Kamran backs away outside leg. Manufactures swinging room and pumps it over long-off
follows the full one with a short ball outside off. Kamran was waiting for it. Nails a pull over square leg
slower and outside off, flashed to point
dragged short and outside off. Pulled to deep midwicket
slower outside off, chopped to sweeper cover

heavy short ball outside off, seam-up, swatted away to the right of Imad at deep midwicket. He slides on his knees and his right foot may have been in contact with the ad board while attempting to flick the ball inside the field of play. Four runs it is. Kamran moves to 98
dug short and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket. Kamran on 99 now
banged in short on middle, Samuels tees off now. He goes back and pummels it beyond the second tier. Dispatched over midwicket
full ball on off, scythed away to wide long-off

that's the first century of this season's PSL and the second overall. Kamran has his hands aloft and acknowledges the crowd. He gets a hug from Samuels. Kamran also pulls off the rock-the-baby celebration Ã  la Sammy. Good length on off, bunted to cover for one
leg-stump yorker, squeezed to long-on
142.1ks red-hot yorker on the leg stump, inside-edged behind to the keeper. Sanga effects a direct hit. Samuels dishes out a desperate dive and is safe
back of a length on middle, Samuels swings, and edges it past Sangakkara
another ripping yorker, kept out
shortish on middle, worked to leg
right in the blockhole on middle, dug back down the pitch
yorker, dug past the bowler again
length ball on off, heaved to deep midwicket
off-stump yorker, pushed down to long-on. Excellent death-overs bowling from Usman and Amir
another yorker on the off stump, squeezed back to the bowler

Amir hits the blockhole on middle and leg, dragged away in the direction of deep midwicket. Samuels wants two, Kamran is caught short at the non-striker's end. Amir calmly collects the throw from Bopara and tips the bails off. Kamran is warmly congratulated by the Karachi players
short on leg stump, Samuels swipes at it and inside-edges it fine past the leg stump
yorker on leg stump, dug to long-on
Buh-bye Afridi. The crowd hushed into silence. He bags a golden duck. Full on the stumps, Afridi backs away and attempts a loft. Ends up skewing a catch to long-off
another fine yorker, which is jabbed to long-off
full, pitches outside leg, Sammy eyes up a leg-side slog and does not connect. The ball grazes the pad and rolls to cover. They sneak a leg bye
back of a length and outside off, punched crisply but can't beat backward point
overpitched and outside off, another crisp stroke. Driven on the front foot straight to cover-point
short on off, skids on and cramps the batsman for room. Fended back to Hasan
nice and full on off, Azam is on the move as he drives it back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, bunted to cover-point. The off-side ring is well populated
no maiden. Good length and outside off, jabbed down to mid-on
finds swing. Good length and shapes away outside off, Azam flashes and misses

Babar Azam holes out to mid-off! Short and outside off, Babar looks to pull over the leg side. Ends up losing his shape and scooping a simple catch to mid-off. The pressure of dots probably got to him
back of a length and slanting away outside off, opens the face and runs it to point
full on middle, Sanga eyes up the leg side, gets a soft leading edge that rolls to cover
sweetly flicked off the pads to deep square leg
full and angling across off, Gayle shoulders arms
very full on off, jabbed down to mid-off
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length on off, worked to straight midwicket, where the fielder fumbles
full on leg stump, poked to point
short and outside off, leans back and punches to cover
full awaycutter outside off, Gayle has a waft at it, gets an edge, which does not carry to the keeper
another slower cutter, swerves away outside off, this beats the outside edge
full, straight ball, no spin, poked back to the bowler off an inside edge
tossed up on off, Sanga uses his feet, meets the pitch and lofts it stylishly over mid-on who is inside the circle. First boundary of the innings
Sanga shows his ace early. Skips out, Hafeez shortens his length. Adjusts and whips to deep midwicket
full and skids in towards leg stump, beats the inside edge and raps the pad
Gayle uses his feet now, Hafeez pulls his length back and pings the pad again. The ball rolls square through the leg side
flatter and faster on off, clipped down to long-on for one
back of a length and outside off, punchily driven to Afridi at cover
Sanga forces the pace. He charges out again, the bowler dragged his length back. But Sanga still creamed it over cover
back of a length on off, punched more or less straight to Afridi at cover. They take on Afridi's arm. Sanga pushes Gayle and gets the single
full slower ball on middle, dabbed to midwicket. Gayle gets off the mark after nine balls
140.5ks short delivery outside off. Sanga is beaten for pace. He is late onto the pull. Ends up skying a catch off the top edge to Samuels at point. Karachi's chase going nowhere
pitched up and outside off, Gayle does not move his feet much. He is happy to push the ball to cover

Hafeez throws himself to his left from mid-on and completes a sprawling catch. Karachi three down. Malik is waiting near the edge of the boundary as the umpires check for a possible no-ball. Jordan is fine. Malik has to go. Full on off stump, Malik lofts half-heartedly and chips it to mid-on. Soft, soft dismissal
good length and outside off, ignored
Bopara runs down the track and belts a length ball to cover. Can't beat Samuels
very full and angled down leg - wayward ball - leg-side wide
Bopara stands up tall to meet this short ball outside off. Punched in front of mid-on for one
back of a length and just outside off, short-arm jabbed away to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle and leg, hangs back and works it into the vacant spaces at midwicket
non-turning offbreak on off, punched back to Hafeez
down the track and forced to midwicket
tossed full on off, whipped with the wrists to long-on
Gayle uses his feet, Hafeez darts in a short ball - 100ks - Gayle plays across the line and is pinned high on the pad
Gayle shimmies out, meets a short ball and plays it back
Gayle uses his feet again, Hafeez darts in a yorker. Squeezed back to the bowler
looped up full on off, pushed back to Afridi
dropped short and wide outside off, goes back and cracks a cut. Wahab runs across to his right from sweeper cover and makes a smart stop, dragging the ball into the field of play.
101.1ks dart on the leg stump, Gayle misses the pull, the ball lobs up into the hands of Afridi off the thigh pad
dug in short on the leg stump, Gayle finally loosens the shackles. Hammers a pull towards deep square leg, Wahab attempts to swat it back into the field of play. No dice. Six it is
ripping legbreak from Afridi. Starts around off and snakes away past the outside edge
Gayle skips down the track and flicks a single to short fine leg

Bopara skips down the track. Hafeez duly shortens his length. This one slides away wide outside off with the angle from around the wicket. Bopara reaches out but can't touch the ball. Kamran does the rest behind the stumps
Hafeez flights this on off stump, Pollard has to go after it right away. He carves it over cover
really full ball on off, pushed back to the bowler
low full-toss on the legs, clipped to long-on
dances out, meets a full ball on middle and whips a single to deep midwicket
pushed through outside off, Gayle plants his front leg and hammers it past the bowler
slider outside off, pushed to cover
short and outside off, Pollard stands tall and punches to cover
Gayle puts Afridi into the stands beyond midwicket. Length and outside off, goes low and smites a slog-sweep
seam-up bouncer outside off, swat-pulled away over square leg for back-to-back sixes. Gayle and Karachi Kings spring back to life
tossed on the leg stump, attempts a slog-sweep and inside-edges to short fine leg. 35 off the last three overs. Can Gayle and Pollard pull off a Houdini act
that's a stinger. Afridi is bleeding. Bursts through his hands. Has Afridi split his webbing? He rushes off the field. Slower full ball outside off, Pollard smashes it to Afridi at cover
very full and wide outside off, past the guideline, left alone
fuller one on off, Gayle wants to smack it over the covers, but this skews off the outside edge to deep third man
dug in short and outside off, half-tracker, Pollard unleashes a powerful pull and sends it to the long-on fence
full on the stumps, belted to long-on
full on middle and leg, Gayle plonks his front leg forward and lifts it over wide long-on
overpitched and outside off, Gayle drops to one knee and drills it to long-off. From 2 off 15, Gayle has sprinted to 36 off 27
slower short ball outside off, Gayle checks his shot and dabs it to point with soft hands
short and angling away outside off, Pollard opens the face and steers a single to third man

ripping yorker outside off, Gayle is late to bring his bat down. He gets an inside edge, which hits the leg stump and believe it or not sneaks away to the fine leg boundary. The zing bails did not light up, did not budge at all
very full and outside off, jammed out to short third man

Wahab delivers the killer blow. The zing bails light up now and Wahab lets out a big roar. Rapid yorker, Gayle is beaten for pace. Wahab hits the leg stump again. This one does the job for Peshawar. Karachi coach Arthur throws his head back in despair
length and outside off, guided to point
tossed up on middle, Pollard opens up his shoulders and wallops it over the bowler's head. Into the top tier
short on the leg stump, whipped between deep square and deep midwicket
dropped short on the leg stump, punched down to long-on
short on the pads, clipped away square through the leg side
Asghar gives it some air again. Dangles it wide outside off, Pollard drops to one knee, reaches for the ball, and drags it high and over long-on for another six
speared down leg, past the glance, wide
good length ball drifts in on middle, nurdled behind square leg for one
length ball outside off, Pollard sizes it up and punches it into orbit. Whoa! The ball drops onto the straight boundary
full and wide outside off, flat-batted away powerfully past sweeper cover's right. That flew to the boundary even though the bottom hand came off the bat
short and angled in on off, Pollard was hanging on the back foot for it. Works a single to the square-leg region
full and angling away outside off, Imad scythes a cut to deep point
tries a slower bouncer, too high, wide
Pollard shimmies out, this is short and shading outside leg. Pollard leaves it. Not a wide
full and outside off, Imad charges out and flashes to deep cover
Pollard manufactures swinging room by moving outside leg. Short, he attempts a punch and finds long-on
back of a length and outside off, Imad flicks his wrists, picks the ball up in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
shortish on middle, shovelled away between deep midwicket and long-on again
nice and full outside off, slower ball, Imad gets into the act. Clears his front leg and smears Hasan Ali over mid-off who is inside the circle
Imad shimmies out and yorks himself. Squeezes a single to mid-off
Wahab slings it very full and wide outside off. Imad reaches out for the ball and misses. Legal ball
slower short ball on off, Imad flat-bats it to long-on
short and angling into the hips from around the stumps, deflected to square leg
very full and wide outside off, Imad reaches out for the ball, connects with this and scythes this up and over Hafeez at backward point
Wahab goes shorter and outside off, swing and a miss from Imad
pitched up and outside off, driven to cover
wide yorker, that's the length in these slog overs - Imad is beaten for pace. Can't make contact with the ball
drifts a slower ball down leg, wide
full-toss on middle, sliced to cover
very full and outside off, flat-batted to the right of mid-off. Wahab dishes out a full-length dive to stop it
full-toss outside off, Imad goes low and slog-sweeps only as far as square leg
short of a length on off, shovel-pulled straight to deep midwicket.
yorker on middle and leg, dug out to cover. Excellent over - just six off it
full and very wide outside off, sliced away to deep third man
slower lifter outside off, beats Pollard on the hook
Wahab ventures wide of the crease, slips in a slower ball, beats Pollard again. He is through with the shot early. The ball bounces twice before reaching Kamran behind the stumps
back of a length and on off stump, Pollard biffs it away to the left of deep square leg. Muscular tug from the big man

Pollard goes and with it Karachi's hopes? Very full and wide outside off, Wahab forces Pollard to reach out for the ball. He throws his bat at it and thickly edges it behind. Kamran gulps it down. If Pollard had left that alone, it could have been an off-side wide
back of a length and outside off, carved away to short third man. The fielder fumbles, but that's just a single
pretty full and outside off, jabbed to cover
really full and wide outside off again. Jordan asks Imad to reach out for the ball. The batsman does so and slices a cut to backward point. Good, diving catch from Hafeez
yorker on off, outside-edged to deep third man

very full on off, Sohail plays across the line and is pinned on the pad. Not given lbw by the umpire The ball rolls to cover and the batsmen pinch a leg bye. Kamran signals for a review. The ball brushed the front pad and then ricocheted onto the back pad. This is heading down leg. The on-field not-out call is upheld by the TV umpire
back of a length on middle, Amir slinks away outside the leg stump and goes over a leaping extra cover
the left-hander backs away outside leg, Jordan follows him with a full slower ball, which is pushed past him
full and wide outside off, carved in the air to deep point
slower dipping yorker on the off stump, Sohail can only dig it back to Sammy
slower short ball outside off, slashed to cover. Sammy has his hand aloft. The celebrations begin in the Peshawar camp
dug in short and outside off, Amir swings and only connects with thin air
Sammy has a sheepish smile. Full cutter outside off, left alone. Drifts past the guideline
seam-up, full and wide outside off, another off-side wide as Amir lets it pass
full slower ball on the off stump, slogged off the inside half to square leg

slower short ball outside off, pulled in the air, the man at deep midwicket tumbles and drops the catch. Peshawar, though, celebrate. Peshawar will face Quetta in the final in Lahore. Time for more selfies for Sammy's men. Peshawar take a lap of honour and thank the fans
